name: The Curl Crew Instant Damage Repair Treatment + Curl Defining Cream Set
about: What it is: Your travel-friendly powerhouse duo for healthy-looking, defined, frizz-free curls that pop: a bond-building treatment plus a one-step curl cream. Both infused with Replenicore-5 to repair, strengthen, hydrate, smooth and protect...Hair Texture: Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Medium..Hair Concerns:- Curl-Enhancing.- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage..Highlighted Ingredients:- Fenty Beauty by Rihannau2019s Proprietary Complex, Replenicore-5: Clinically tested to visibly repair and strengthen, hydrate, smooth, and protect..- Wild Mango Butter: Known to intensely moisturize, nourish, and condition..- Baobab Seed Extract and Chia Seed Extract: Known to visibly strengthen and nourish...Ingredient Callouts: These products are vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: The Curl Crew includes two powerhouses, curated to uplift your curls in a major way. The Comeback Kid Instant Damage Repair Treatment shows you itu2019s never too late to make a change. It penetrates deep into the cortex to provide care from the inside out, support damaged keratin structures, and visibly strengthen weak, fragile curls. The Homecurl Curl-Defining Cream holds it down with soft, touchable definition in a frizz-fighting gel-cream you can always trust. A duo thatu2019s always down to take your curls to the next level...Fragrance Description: Luxe, rich, brightu2014the scent of a new era. Fenty Beautyu2019s signature warm, ambery floral fragrance drips you in notes of sparkling yuzu, golden amber, soothing florals, indulgent vanilla, and creamy sandalwood..This Set Contains:- 3.4 oz/ 100 mL The Homecurl Curl-Defining Cream (curl cream).- 2 oz/ 60 mL The Comeback Kid Instant Damage Repair Treatment Bond Builder (damage formula)..Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.The Homecurl Curl-Defining Cream:.-Divide clean, damp hair into sections..-Apply to each section from root to ends, raking through to ensure even distribution..-Scrunch to encourage curl definition, or style as desired..-For fine curls, start with a little and add more as needed...The Comeback Kid Instant Damage Repair Treatment Bond Builder: .The choice is yours:.-For thicker or more damaged hair, leave in. .-For finer or less damaged hair, rinse out. ..Rinse-Out Method: .-After cleansing with Fenty Beauty by Rihannau2019s The Rich One Moisture Repair Shampoo (sold separately), apply root to tip until hair is saturated. .-Comb through. .-Leave on for three to five minutes..-Rinse well. .-Style as desiredu2014no need to follow up with a conditioner. ..Leave-In Method: .-After cleansing Fenty Beauty by Rihannau2019s The Rich One Moisture Repair Shampoo (sold separately), apply to wet hair, root to tip. .-Comb through..-Style as desired.
